verses.verse: And the YY <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> unto Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>,

Speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8761><s%> unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, and say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto them, When ye be come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> into the land <S%H776><s%> of your habitations <S%H4186><s%>, which I give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8802><s%> unto you,

And will make <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> an offering by fire <S%H801><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%>, a burnt offering <S%H5930><s%>, or a sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> in performing <S%H6381><s%> <S%H8763><s%> a vow <S%H5088><s%>, or in a freewill offering <S%H5071><s%>, or in your solemn feasts <S%H4150><s%>, to make <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8800><s%> a sweet <S%H5207><s%> savour <S%H7381><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%>, of the herd <S%H1241><s%>, or of the flock <S%H6629><s%>:

Then shall he that offereth <S%H7126><s%> <S%H8688><s%> his offering <S%H7133><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%> bring <S%H7126><s%> <S%H8689><s%> a meat offering <S%H4503><s%> of a tenth deal <S%H6241><s%> of flour <S%H5560><s%> mingled <S%H1101><s%> <S%H8803><s%> with the fourth <S%H7243><s%> part of an hin <S%H1969><s%> of oil <S%H8081><s%>.

And the fourth <S%H7243><s%> part of an hin <S%H1969><s%> of wine <S%H3196><s%> for a drink offering <S%H5262><s%> shalt thou prepare <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with the burnt offering <S%H5930><s%> or sacrifice <S%H2077><s%>, for one <S%H259><s%> lamb <S%H3532><s%>.

Or for a ram <S%H352><s%>, thou shalt prepare <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> for a meat offering <S%H4503><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> tenth deals <S%H6241><s%> of flour <S%H5560><s%> mingled <S%H1101><s%> <S%H8803><s%> with the third <S%H7992><s%> part of an hin <S%H1969><s%> of oil <S%H8081><s%>.

And for a drink offering <S%H5262><s%> thou shalt offer <S%H7126><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the third <S%H7992><s%> part of an hin <S%H1969><s%> of wine <S%H3196><s%>, for a sweet <S%H5207><s%> savour <S%H7381><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%>.

And when thou preparest <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> a bullock <S%H1121><s%> <S%H1241><s%> for a burnt offering <S%H5930><s%>, or for a sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> in performing <S%H6381><s%> <S%H8763><s%> a vow <S%H5088><s%>, or peace offerings <S%H8002><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%>:

Then shall he bring <S%H7126><s%> <S%H8689><s%> with a bullock <S%H1241><s%> <S%H1121><s%> a meat offering <S%H4503><s%> of three <S%H7969><s%> tenth deals <S%H6241><s%> of flour <S%H5560><s%> mingled <S%H1101><s%> <S%H8803><s%> with half <S%H2677><s%> an hin <S%H1969><s%> of oil <S%H8081><s%>.

And thou shalt bring <S%H7126><s%> <S%H8686><s%> for a drink offering <S%H5262><s%> half <S%H2677><s%> an hin <S%H1969><s%> of wine <S%H3196><s%>, for an offering made by fire <S%H801><s%>, of a sweet <S%H5207><s%> savour <S%H7381><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%>.

Thus shall it be done <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8735><s%> for one <S%H259><s%> bullock <S%H7794><s%>, or for one <S%H259><s%> ram <S%H352><s%>, or for a lamb <S%H3532><s%> <S%H7716><s%>, or a kid <S%H5795><s%>.

According to the number <S%H4557><s%> that ye shall prepare <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, so <S%H3602><s%> shall ye do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to every one <S%H259><s%> according to their number <S%H4557><s%>.

All that are born of the country <S%H249><s%> shall do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> these things after this manner, in offering <S%H7126><s%> <S%H8687><s%> an offering made by fire <S%H801><s%>, of a sweet <S%H5207><s%> savour <S%H7381><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%>.

And if a stranger <S%H1616><s%> sojourn <S%H1481><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with you, or whosoever be among <S%H8432><s%> you in your generations <S%H1755><s%>, and will offer <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> an offering made by fire <S%H801><s%>, of a sweet <S%H5207><s%> savour <S%H7381><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%>; as ye do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, so he shall do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

One <S%H259><s%> ordinance <S%H2708><s%> shall be both for you of the congregation <S%H6951><s%>, and also for the stranger <S%H1616><s%> that sojourneth <S%H1481><s%> <S%H8802><s%> with you, an ordinance <S%H2708><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%> in your generations <S%H1755><s%>: as ye are, so shall the stranger <S%H1616><s%> be before <S%H6440><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>.
One <S%H259><s%> Torah <S%H8451><s%> and one <S%H259><s%> manner <S%H4941><s%> shall be for you, and for the stranger <S%H1616><s%> that sojourneth <S%H1481><s%> <S%H8802><s%> with you.
And the YY <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> unto Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>,

Speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8761><s%> unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, and say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto them, When ye come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8800><s%> into the land <S%H776><s%> whither I bring <S%H935><s%> <S%H8688><s%> you,

Then it shall be, that, when ye eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8800><s%> of the bread <S%H3899><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%>, ye shall offer up <S%H7311><s%> <S%H8686><s%> an heave offering <S%H8641><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%>.

Ye shall offer up <S%H7311><s%> <S%H8686><s%> a cake <S%H2471><s%> of the first <S%H7225><s%> of your dough <S%H6182><s%> for an heave offering <S%H8641><s%>: as ye do the heave offering <S%H8641><s%> of the threshingfloor <S%H1637><s%>, so shall ye heave <S%H7311><s%> <S%H8686><s%> it.
Of the first <S%H7225><s%> of your dough <S%H6182><s%> ye shall give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%> an heave offering <S%H8641><s%> in your generations <S%H1755><s%>.

And if ye have erred <S%H7686><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and not observed <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> all these Mitzvot <S%H4687><s%>, which the YY <S%H3068><s%> hath spoken <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8765><s%> unto Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>,

Havahn all that the YY <S%H3068><s%> hath commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8765><s%> you by the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>, from the day <S%H3117><s%> that the YY <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8765><s%> Mosheh, and henceforward <S%H1973><s%> among your generations <S%H1755><s%>;

Then it shall be, if ought be committed <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8738><s%> by ignorance <S%H7684><s%> without the knowledge <S%H5869><s%> of the congregation <S%H5712><s%>, that all the congregation <S%H5712><s%> shall offer <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> one <S%H259><s%> young <S%H1121><s%> <S%H1241><s%> bullock <S%H6499><s%> for a burnt offering <S%H5930><s%>, for a sweet <S%H5207><s%> savour <S%H7381><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%>, with his meat offering <S%H4503><s%>, and his drink offering <S%H5262><s%>, according to the manner <S%H4941><s%>, and one <S%H259><s%> kid <S%H8163><s%> of the goats <S%H5795><s%> for a sin offering <S%H2403><s%>.

And the Kohen <S%H3548><s%> shall make an atonement <S%H3722><s%> <S%H8765><s%> for all the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, and it shall be forgiven <S%H5545><s%> <S%H8738><s%> them; for it is ignorance <S%H7684><s%>: and they shall bring <S%H935><s%> <S%H8689><s%> their offering <S%H7133><s%>, a sacrifice made by fire <S%H801><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%>, and their sin offering <S%H2403><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>, for their ignorance <S%H7684><s%>:

And it shall be forgiven <S%H5545><s%> <S%H8738><s%> all the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, and the stranger <S%H1616><s%> that sojourneth <S%H1481><s%> <S%H8802><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> them; seeing all the people <S%H5971><s%> were in ignorance <S%H7684><s%>.

And if any <S%H259><s%> soul <S%H5315><s%> sin <S%H2398><s%> <S%H8799><s%> through ignorance <S%H7684><s%>, then he shall bring <S%H7126><s%> <S%H8689><s%> a she goat <S%H5795><s%> of the first <S%H1323><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> for a sin offering <S%H2403><s%>.

And the Kohen <S%H3548><s%> shall make an atonement <S%H3722><s%> <S%H8765><s%> for the soul <S%H5315><s%> that sinneth ignorantly <S%H7683><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, when he sinneth <S%H2398><s%> <S%H8800><s%> by ignorance <S%H7684><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>, to make an atonement <S%H3722><s%> <S%H8763><s%> for him; and it shall be forgiven <S%H5545><s%> <S%H8738><s%> him.

Ye shall have one <S%H259><s%> Torah <S%H8451><s%> for him that sinneth <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8802><s%> through ignorance <S%H7684><s%>, both for him that is born <S%H249><s%> among the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, and for the stranger <S%H1616><s%> that sojourneth <S%H1481><s%> <S%H8802><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> them.

But the soul <S%H5315><s%> that doeth <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> ought presumptuously <S%H7311><s%> <S%H8802><s%> <S%H3027><s%>, whether he be born in the land <S%H249><s%>, or a stranger <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1616><s%>, the same reproacheth <S%H1442><s%> <S%H8764><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>; and that soul <S%H5315><s%> shall be cut off <S%H3772><s%> <S%H8738><s%> from among <S%H7130><s%> his people <S%H5971><s%>.

Because he hath despised <S%H959><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>, and hath broken <S%H6565><s%> <S%H8689><s%> his Mitzvah <S%H4687><s%>, that soul <S%H5315><s%> shall utterly <S%H3772><s%> <S%H8736><s%> be cut off <S%H3772><s%> <S%H8735><s%>; his iniquity <S%H5771><s%> shall be upon him.

And while the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> were in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>, they found <S%H4672><s%> <S%H8799><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> that gathered <S%H7197><s%> <S%H8781><s%> sticks <S%H6086><s%> upon the sabbath <S%H7676><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>.

And they that found <S%H4672><s%> <S%H8802><s%> him gathering <S%H7197><s%> <S%H8781><s%> sticks <S%H6086><s%> brought <S%H7126><s%> <S%H8686><s%> him unto Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> and Aharon <S%H175><s%>, and unto all the congregation <S%H5712><s%>.
And they put <S%H3240><s%> <S%H8686><s%> him in ward <S%H4929><s%>, because it was not declared <S%H6567><s%> <S%H8795><s%> what should be done <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8735><s%> to him.

And the YY <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>, The man <S%H376><s%> shall be surely <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8800><s%> put to death <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8714><s%>: all the congregation <S%H5712><s%> shall stone <S%H7275><s%> <S%H8800><s%> him with stones <S%H68><s%> without <S%H2351><s%> the camp <S%H4264><s%>.

And all the congregation <S%H5712><s%> brought <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8686><s%> him without <S%H2351><s%> the camp <S%H4264><s%>, and stoned <S%H7275><s%> <S%H8799><s%> him with stones <S%H68><s%>, and he died <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8799><s%>; as the YY <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8765><s%> Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>.
And the YY <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>,

Speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8761><s%> unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, and bid <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> them that they make <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> them fringes <S%H6734><s%> in the borders <S%H3671><s%> of their garments <S%H899><s%> throughout their generations <S%H1755><s%>, and that they put <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> upon the fringe <S%H6734><s%> of the borders <S%H3671><s%> a ribband <S%H6616><s%> of blue <S%H8504><s%>:

And it shall be unto you for a fringe <S%H6734><s%>, that ye may look <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8804><s%> upon it, and remember <S%H2142><s%> <S%H8804><s%> all the Mitzvot <S%H4687><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>, and do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> them; and that ye seek <S%H8446><s%> <S%H8799><s%> not after <S%H310><s%> your own heart <S%H3824><s%> and your own eyes <S%H5869><s%>, after <S%H310><s%> which ye use to go a whoring <S%H2181><s%> <S%H8802><s%>:

That ye may remember <S%H2142><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> all my Mitzvot <S%H4687><s%>, and be <S%H1961><s%> <S%H8804><s%> holy <S%H6918><s%> unto your 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>.

I am the YY <S%H3068><s%> your 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, which brought you out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8689><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, to be your 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>: I am the YY <S%H3068><s%> your 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>.
